data.title: Start Round Art + Double Doors Pit
data.description: Use this extremely powerful Viper ultimate to effectively lockdown mid control. This ultimate allows your art player to play inside of it, or outside and have it act as a smoke.

data.title: Standard B Site Defender Wall to Screens
data.description: Here's an easy, yet effective wall you can throw at the start of the round. Use this to retake, or contest the B Site. There's a little pocket for you to hide in screens to potentially make a round winning play.

data.title: Standard A Main Defenders Wall to Double Doors
data.description: Here's a powerful default wall you can throw to cover the entrance of A Main, Art stairs, and Double Doors.
